short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces ANSI escape sequences with the HTML equivalent in AWS CloudWatch (V1 and V2)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces ANSI escape sequences in AWS CloudWatch to make logs easier to read.
This is very useful for logs generated by a Spring Boot or Node.js application for example.
